Deprecated API

Deprecated Classes
com.taursys.dom.XMLFactory
          - Use DocumentAdapter instead. This class will be removed before version 2.0. 
com.taursys.dom.XMLProxy
          - Use the DocumentAdapter instead. This class will be removed before version 2.0 
 

Deprecated Methods
com.taursys.model.ObjectArrayValueHolder.getVariantArray()
          - use setArray - this method will be removed soon 
com.taursys.model.DefaultSelectModel.isNullAllowed()
          - null will ALWAYS be allowed regardless of this setting. This method will be removed soon. 
com.taursys.model.SelectModel.isNullAllowed()
          - null will ALWAYS be allowed regardless of this setting. This property will be removed shortly 
com.taursys.xml.SelectField.isNullAllowed()
          - null will ALWAYS be allowed regardless of this setting. This property will be removed shortly 
com.taursys.html.render.HTMLSelectFieldRenderer.render(SelectField)
          - use constructor that takes a SelectField as parameter and render that takes no parameters. 
com.taursys.xml.render.SelectFieldRenderer.render(SelectField)
          - use constructor that takes a SelectField as parameter and render that takes no parameters. 
com.taursys.xml.render.AttributeSelectFieldRenderer.render(SelectField)
          - use constructor that takes a SelectField as parameter and render that takes no parameters. 
com.taursys.xml.render.TextFieldRenderer.render(TextField)
          - use constructor that takes a TextField as parameter and render that takes no parameters. 
com.taursys.xml.render.AttributeTextFieldRenderer.render(TextField)
          - use constructor that takes a TextField as parameter and render that takes no parameters. 
com.taursys.model.DefaultSelectModel.setNullAllowed(boolean)
          - null will ALWAYS be allowed regardless of this setting. This method will be removed soon. 
com.taursys.model.SelectModel.setNullAllowed(boolean)
          - null will ALWAYS be allowed regardless of this setting. This property will be removed shortly 
com.taursys.xml.SelectField.setNullAllowed(boolean)
          - null will ALWAYS be allowed regardless of this setting. This property will be removed shortly 
com.taursys.model.ObjectArrayValueHolder.setVariantArray(Object[])
          - use setArray - this method will be removed soon 
 

Deprecated Constructors
com.taursys.xml.render.AttributeSelectFieldRenderer()
          - use constructor that takes a SelectField as parameter 
com.taursys.xml.render.AttributeTextFieldRenderer()
          - use constructor that takes a TextField as parameter 
com.taursys.html.render.HTMLSelectFieldRenderer()
          - use constructor that takes a SelectField as parameter 
com.taursys.xml.render.SelectFieldRenderer()
          - use constructor that takes a SelectField as parameter 
com.taursys.xml.render.TextFieldRenderer()
          - use constructor that takes a TextField as parameter
